snippet.title: inFAMOUS Second Son - E3 Trailer (PS4) | E3 2013
snippet.description:
inFAMOUS: Second Son is available on March 21, 2014.
http://us.playstation.com/ps4/games/infamous-second-son-ps4.html

Reggie isn't so sure if the people will be so accepting of his brother's new found superpowers... but Delsin Rowe can't get enough of his powers and he's ready to show Seattle what he can do.

Surrounded by a society that fears them, superhumans are ruthlessly hunted down and caged by the Department of Unified Protection. When Delsin Rowe discovers his powers he's forced to run, searching for other superhumans in order to save those he loves from the oppressive D.U.P. The choices he makes along the way change the future of everyone around him.

©2013 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. inFAMOUS Second Son is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Sucker Punch Productions LLC. The Space Needle is a registered trademark of Space Needle LLC and is used under license.

"Heart Shaped Box" by Dead Sara. (Composed by Kurt Cobain, Primary Wave Tunes (BMI) / The End Of Music LLC (BMI))
